result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: to Judge Falstad from J.W. - includes 13CF38, 14CF412, 14CF700, 14CF752 - stj
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Case Called: 9:33am. INCLUDES 13CF38- Mtn to Reovke DEOJ, 14CF412, 14CF700, 14CF752, 14TR3033, 14TR3034- PLEAS. Clerk: Denise.  State appears by ADA Kerri Puig. Defendant appears by and with Atty Pauline Toulouse. State moves to enter judgment on ct 1 (poss meth) 13CF38.  COURT enters Judgment on ct 1 (poss meth) 13CF38.  OTR @9:38am. BOTR @ 9:46am. Informations now filed in 14CF412 & 14CF700.  Crt proceeds with Waiver of Prelim. in 14CF412, 14CF700, 14CF752. Court questions deft as to waivers. Court finds waivers freely and voluntarily made.
 COURT finds PC in all 3 files - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  Information filed in 14CF412 & 14CF700.  Reading Waived. Crt proceeds with plea. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to DRI ct 2 (poss/illegally obtained prescrip) & ct 3 (poss drug para) 14CF412 - crt grants. State moves to DRI cts 1 & 2 (bj/felony) 14CF700- crt grants. State moves to DRI 14CF752, 14TR3033, 14CF3034 - crt grants. PLEA: NO CONTEST - ct 1 (bj/felony) 14CF412; ct 3 (OWI-4th) 14CF700. Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  
Statements by State, Defense & Defendant. 
COURT ORDERS: 
 SWH - 2 yrs probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: $1,959.00 inclusive cc; 60 days MCJ w/huber if eligible pursusant to jail criteria; no objection to EMP; must commence w/in 45 days or discretion of the agent;  Any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 26 months, as is the defendant himself, and device to be installed;  Crt orders 1/2 Price IID; 26 months dl revocation; AODA-; Absolute Sobriety; Counseling & Treatment; Good faith effort to obtaind and maintain fulltime employment and/or school; Court Costs; 1 DNA Surcharge- 13CF38 & 14CF412; DNA Sample & Surcharge. Credit of 14 days in 13CF38 and 6 days in 14CF700. COURT informs and defendant signs Ineligible Voting Form. Atty Toulouse moves for bond to be returned to postor. State does not take position. COURT ORDERS bond returned to postor. 

Adjourned: 10:10am.

Clerk Cheree
Cases 14CF412, 14CF700, 14CF752, 14TR3033 called: 2:01pm
State appears by ADA K.Puig; Defendant appears in person and with Attorney Toulouse
(Originally set for Plea/Sentencing - scheduled in Dec 2014 for today's date)

Atty Toulouse states defendant is not ready to enter plea today - wants more time to speak with counsel and Atty Toulouse wants more time to speak with State.
State notes they are ready to proceed today and not sure why plea cannot go forward today, but will speak with Atty Toulouse after hearing concludes
COURT sets matter for CC on Monday 3/23 at 1:00 - parties to either set plea or JT
Bond continues.

Adj: 2:04pm
Granting Termination of ATTIC Day Report as a Bond Condition - includes 14CF38, 14CF412, 14CF700, 14CF752
Plea/sentencing hearing on March 20, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on November 25, 2014 at 11:30 am.
